verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to Mahalath. A Maskil of David.) The <S%H5036>fool<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%>" They are <S%H7843>corrupt,<s%> and have <S%H8581>committed<s%> <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5766>injustice;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H9185>good.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> upon the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> To <S%H7200>see<s%> if <S%H3426>there<s%> is anyone who <S%H7919>understands,<s%> Who <S%H1875>seeks<s%> after <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> of them has <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H5472>aside;<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> they have <S%H444>become<s%> <S%H444>corrupt;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H9185>good,<s%> not <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

<S%H3045>Have<s%> the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>wickedness<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3045>knowledge,<s%> Who <S%H398>eat<s%> up My <S%H5971>people<s%> [as though] they <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> And have not <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H430>God<s%>?

<S%H8033>There<s%> they were in <S%H6343>great<s%> <S%H6343>fear<s%> [where] <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6343>fear<s%> had <S%H1961>been;<s%> For <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6340>scattered<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of him who <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against you; You <S%H954>put<s%> [them] to <S%H954>shame,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3988>rejected<s%> them.

<S%H4310>Oh,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would come out of <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> When <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7725>restores<s%> His <S%H7622>captive<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> Let <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
